shadow-lord.name: The Shadow Lord
shadow-lord.description: An ancient entity that feeds on the darkness between worlds

phases.name: Shadow Minions
phases.description: Twisted creatures emerge from the shadows to defend their master
phases.flavorText: Dark creatures surge from the void as you approach the Shadow Lord's sanctum...
phases.victoryText: The minions dissolve back into shadow. The path ahead grows darker...

phases.name: Collapsing Sanctum
phases.description: The Shadow Lord's presence destabilizes reality itself
phases.flavorText: The ground cracks and reality tears as the Shadow Lord's power warps the very fabric of existence...
phases.successText: You navigate the collapsing reality with careful precision!
phases.failureText: The unstable reality tears at your essence!

phases.name: The Shadow Lord
phases.description: The ancient Shadow Lord reveals its true form
phases.flavorText: The Shadow Lord emerges from the darkness, its form shifting between nightmare and void...
phases.victoryText: The Shadow Lord lets out a final wail as it dissolves into nothingness. Light returns to this realm!
phases.defeatText: The shadows consume everything. Your quest ends in darkness...

victoryRewards.completionMessage: üèÜ Victory! You have banished the Shadow Lord! The deeper mysteries await...

crystal-tyrant.name: The Crystal Tyrant
crystal-tyrant.description: A massive crystalline being that has corrupted the deep caverns

phases.name: Crystal Guardians
phases.description: Living crystal constructs block your path
phases.flavorText: Massive crystal beings animate around the Tyrant's throne, their faceted forms gleaming with malevolent energy...
phases.victoryText: The crystal guardians shatter into harmless fragments. The Tyrant roars in anger...

phases.name: Prismatic Labyrinth
phases.description: Navigate through a maze of deadly light prisms
phases.flavorText: The Tyrant creates a labyrinth of burning light that cuts through armor and flesh alike...
phases.successText: You weave through the deadly beams with warrior's precision!
phases.failureText: The searing light finds its mark, burning deep!

phases.name: The Crystal Tyrant
phases.description: The Crystal Tyrant attacks with devastating crystalline magic
phases.flavorText: The Crystal Tyrant rises to its full height, its crystalline form refracting the light into deadly rainbow patterns...
phases.victoryText: The Crystal Tyrant's form begins to crack and split. With a sound like breaking mountains, it shatters completely!
phases.defeatText: You are trapped forever within the Tyrant's crystal prison...

victoryRewards.completionMessage: üèÜ Victory! You have shattered the Crystal Tyrant! The void beckons beyond...

void-empress.name: The Void Empress
void-empress.description: The ultimate evil that seeks to unmake all existence

phases.name: Spawn of the Void
phases.description: Creatures of pure nothingness assault your party
phases.flavorText: Beings of absolute nothingness materialize from the Empress's dark will, seeking to erase your very existence...
phases.victoryText: The void spawn retreat into nothingness, but the Empress's laughter echoes through the emptiness...

phases.name: Reality Storm
phases.description: Survive the Empress's attempt to unmake reality itself
phases.flavorText: The Void Empress unleashes a storm of pure entropy that threatens to erase you from existence...
phases.successText: Your will to exist proves stronger than the void! Reality holds firm around you!
phases.failureText: Parts of your being begin to fade as the void takes hold...

phases.name: The Final Stand
phases.description: Your allies offer to sacrifice themselves to weaken the Empress
phases.flavorText: As the Void Empress prepares her final assault, your allies step forward, ready to give everything for victory...
phases.mechanicText: Choose: Fight alone with wounded party, or let allies sacrifice themselves for advantage

phases.name: The Void Empress
phases.description: The final battle against the destroyer of worlds
phases.flavorText: The Void Empress stands before you in her terrible glory, reality bending and breaking around her presence...
phases.victoryText: The Void Empress screams as light pierces her darkness. Existence itself breathes a sigh of relief as she fades away!
phases.defeatText: Everything fades to nothing. The Empress has won, and existence itself comes to an end...

victoryRewards.completionMessage: üèÜ ULTIMATE VICTORY! You have defeated the Void Empress and saved all of existence!

shadow-lord-final.name: The Shadow Lord
shadow-lord-final.description: An ancient entity wreathed in living darkness

crystal-tyrant-final.name: The Crystal Tyrant
crystal-tyrant-final.description: A massive crystalline being of immense power

void-empress-final.name: The Void Empress
void-empress-final.description: The ultimate destroyer of existence itself

crystal-guardian.name: Crystal Guardian
crystal-guardian.description: A living crystal construct animated by the Tyrant's will

void-spawn.name: Void Spawn
void-spawn.description: A creature of pure nothingness given form

void-wraith.name: Void Wraith
void-wraith.description: A spirit consumed by the void's hunger
